description: Product Key Scanner is a tool that scans the Registry of Windows Operating system and finds the product keys of Windows and other Microsoft products. You can scan the Registry of your current running system, as well as you can scan the Registry from external hard drive plugged to your computer. When scanning the product keys of your current running system, you can also search product key stored in BIOS, and search product keys by using WMI.
shortcuts: NirSoft\Product Key Scanner - Product Key Scanner for Windows
